summary: This module implements algorithms to synthesize quantum circuits that prepare stabilizer states. It converts a stabilizer description into a sequence of Clifford operations, builds an intermediate graph state, and decomposes it into layers of gates, optionally optimizing for linear nearest‑neighbor connectivity and circuit depth.
business_intent: Enable quantum software developers and researchers to generate efficient, hardware‑aware circuits for stabilizer state preparation, facilitating simulation, benchmarking, and execution on quantum processors.
